dcterms:description: The CoNLL 2003 dataset is a widely used benchmark for Named Entity Recognition (NER) tasks in English. It includes training, development, and test sets with annotations for person, organization, location, and miscellaneous entities.
dcterms:title: CoNLL 2003

dcterms:description: Template Sentences (TS) are part of the supplementary materials created by the authors to test the ability of NER models to detect proper boundaries of entities by replacing template entities with others.
dcterms:title: Template Sentences (TS)

dcterms:description: Document Context Sentences (DCS) are part of the supplementary materials created by the authors to test the ability of NER models to recognize entities based on document-level context.
dcterms:title: Document Context Sentences (DCS)

dcterms:description: Random Sentences (RS) are part of the supplementary materials created by the authors to test the stability of NER models by providing pseudo-sentences with random words and capitalization.
dcterms:title: Random Sentences (RS)
